frontend.interfaces

Interface StateFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyStateFactory

    public interface StateFactory
extends java.io.Serializable
    A factory to create state object for the selection tool
    Author:
    zannc2 & gfells4

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractState createDragAreaState(SelectionTool context)
      Creates and returns the state object used while the user drags on the area of a sheet.
      AbstractState createDragHandleState(SelectionTool context)
      Creates and returns the state object used while the user drags on the handler of an Item.
      AbstractState createInitState(SelectionTool context)
      Creates and returns the state object used while the user starts using the selection tool.
      AbstractState createMovingState(SelectionTool context)
      Creates and returns the state object used while the user is moving a selection.
